Text: how can i tell what date essential mix im downloading , as i dont want them all just a few from this year ?

Seems to me its obvious!

1996-04-14 - Pete Tong and TWA, Live from Vague, Leeds.

Date is: 14th April 1994
Artist is: Pete Tong and TWA
Location: Live from Vague, Leeds.

What else is there do you need to know? D'uh!

@pirate1977 ..... easiest way to do it, is click to download the torrent.. open your download folder and write down which files you want.. delete torrent, then re-download selected files only.. simple ! 

thanks for the up DR_ZAXXON, top man !

I didn't want to bore you by writing the same generic stuff all through your immense postings so writing here instead. You are an absolute legend who ever you are. I've bit parts of old essential mixes on all formats scattered down through the years but this ammount complete is awsome. Thank you very very much mate.
Gandhi.......
